manifest_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: redis-master
  namespace: default
  labels:
    name: redis-master
spec:
  serviceName: redis-master
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis-master
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: redis-master
        redis-master: 'true'
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: 'false'
    spec:
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      securityContext:
        sysctls:
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies
          value: '0'
        - name: net.ipv4.ip_local_port_range
          value: 1024 65535
        - name: net.core.somaxconn
          value: '65535'
        - name: net.ipv4.ip_unprivileged_port_start
          value: '0'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout
          value: '30'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl
          value: '10'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes
          value: '2'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time
          value: '120'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_ecn
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog
          value: '65536'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_rfc1337
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_slow_start_after_idle
          value: '0'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fack
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets
          value: '262144'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fastopen
          value: '3'
        - name: net.ipv4.icmp_ratelimit
          value: '100'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_abort_on_overflow
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_adv_win_scale
          value: '2'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_retries2
          value: '8'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_syn_retries
          value: '3'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_synack_retries
          value: '2'
        - name: net.unix.max_dgram_qlen
          value: '512'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fwmark_accept
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.fwmark_reflect
          value: '1'
      containers:
      - name: redis
        image: redis:6.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        env:
        - name: MASTER
          value: 'true'
        resources:
          requests:
            memory: 256Mi
            cpu: 250m
          limits:
            memory: 2Gi
            cpu: 2000m
        volumeMounts:
        - name: redis-master-volume
          mountPath: /data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: redis-master-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: redis-master
  namespace: default
  labels:
    name: redis-master
spec:
  serviceName: redis-master
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis-master
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: redis-master
        redis-master: 'true'
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: 'false'
    spec:
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      securityContext:
        sysctls:
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies
          value: '0'
        - name: net.ipv4.ip_local_port_range
          value: 1024 65535
        - name: net.core.somaxconn
          value: '65535'
        - name: net.ipv4.ip_unprivileged_port_start
          value: '0'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout
          value: '30'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl
          value: '10'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes
          value: '2'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time
          value: '120'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_ecn
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog
          value: '65536'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_rfc1337
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_slow_start_after_idle
          value: '0'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fack
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets
          value: '262144'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fastopen
          value: '3'
        - name: net.ipv4.icmp_ratelimit
          value: '100'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_abort_on_overflow
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_adv_win_scale
          value: '2'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_retries2
          value: '8'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_syn_retries
          value: '3'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_synack_retries
          value: '2'
        - name: net.unix.max_dgram_qlen
          value: '512'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fwmark_accept
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.fwmark_reflect
          value: '1'
      containers:
      - name: redis
        image: redis:6.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        env:
        - name: MASTER
          value: 'true'
        resources:
          requests:
            memory: 256Mi
            cpu: 250m
          limits:
            memory: 2Gi
            cpu: 2000m
        volumeMounts:
        - name: redis-master-volume
          mountPath: /data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: redis-master-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi

            memory: 2Gi
            cpu: 2000m
        volumeMounts:
        - name: redis-master-volume
          mountPath: /data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: redis-master-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: redis-master
  namespace: default
  labels:
    name: redis-master
spec:
  serviceName: redis-master
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis-master
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: redis-master
        redis-master: 'true'
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: 'false'
    spec:
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      securityContext:
        sysctls:
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies
          value: '0'
        - name: net.ipv4.ip_local_port_range
          value: 1024 65535
        - name: net.core.somaxconn
          value: '65535'
        - name: net.ipv4.ip_unprivileged_port_start
          value: '0'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout
          value: '30'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl
          value: '10'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes
          value: '2'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time
          value: '120'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_ecn
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog
          value: '65536'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_rfc1337
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_slow_start_after_idle
          value: '0'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fack
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets
          value: '262144'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fastopen
          value: '3'
        - name: net.ipv4.icmp_ratelimit
          value: '100'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_abort_on_overflow
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_adv_win_scale
          value: '2'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_retries2
          value: '8'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_syn_retries
          value: '3'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_synack_retries
          value: '2'
        - name: net.unix.max_dgram_qlen
          value: '512'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fwmark_accept
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.fwmark_reflect
          value: '1'
      containers:
      - name: redis
        image: redis:6.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        env:
        - name: MASTER
          value: 'true'
        resources:
          requests:
            memory: 256Mi
            cpu: 250m
          limits:
            memory: 2Gi
            cpu: 2000m
        volumeMounts:
        - name: redis-master-volume
          mountPath: /data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: redis-master-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi

          value: '1'
      containers:
      - name: redis
        image: redis:6.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        env:
        - name: MASTER
          value: 'true'
        resources:
          requests:
            memory: 256Mi
            cpu: 250m
          limits:
            memory: 2Gi
            cpu: 2000m
        volumeMounts:
        - name: redis-master-volume
          mountPath: /data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: redis-master-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: redis-master
  namespace: default
  labels:
    name: redis-master
spec:
  serviceName: redis-master
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis-master
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: redis-master
        redis-master: 'true'
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: 'false'
    spec:
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      securityContext:
        sysctls:
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies
          value: '0'
        - name: net.ipv4.ip_local_port_range
          value: 1024 65535
        - name: net.core.somaxconn
          value: '65535'
        - name: net.ipv4.ip_unprivileged_port_start
          value: '0'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout
          value: '30'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl
          value: '10'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes
          value: '2'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time
          value: '120'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_ecn
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog
          value: '65536'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_rfc1337
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_slow_start_after_idle
          value: '0'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fack
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets
          value: '262144'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fastopen
          value: '3'
        - name: net.ipv4.icmp_ratelimit
          value: '100'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_abort_on_overflow
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_adv_win_scale
          value: '2'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_retries2
          value: '8'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_syn_retries
          value: '3'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_synack_retries
          value: '2'
        - name: net.unix.max_dgram_qlen
          value: '512'
        - name: net.ipv4.tcp_fwmark_accept
          value: '1'
        - name: net.ipv4.fwmark_reflect
          value: '1'
      containers:
      - name: redis
        image: redis:6.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        env:
        - name: MASTER
          value: 'true'
        resources:
          requests:
            memory: 256Mi
            cpu: 250m
          limits:
            memory: 2Gi
            cpu: 2000m
        volumeMounts:
        - name: redis-master-volume
          mountPath: /data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: redis-master-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi
